input.content:
Filter the following raw HTML state into a clean observation via code based on the task. State:
Expand the sections below, to find and click on the link "tortor".

Section #1

Amet vel, tellus. Velit magna egestas nulla fringilla. Sit ut nunc vel est egestas. Eget amet, sed felis et aliquam.

Section #2

Arcu nunc. Arcu sed a. Dictum. Ac. Urna adipiscing mauris neque, tortor dictumst. A aliquet sit consectetur. Quam nisl, amet.

Section #3

Ac morbi lobortis. Elit rhoncus. Cras. Faucibus elit. Pretium in. Aliquet ac cursus elit morbi ornare tempor ullamcorper risus duis.
If the link is in multiple sections, you only need to find one of the sections. Keep the clean observation in a string variable `obs` in this format: '"xxx" is in Section #1/#2/#3'. The string of the raw state is already in the variable `state` so do not repeat the state in the code. Here are some examples: Write code within three backticks '```' to Expand the sections below, to find and click on the link "morbi". Code: ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup # parse the HTML state soup = BeautifulSoup(state, 'html.parser') # Find all the sections sections = soup.select("div.ui-accordion-content") for index, section in enumerate(sections, 1): if section.find("span", class_="alink", string="morbi"): obs = f'"morbi" is in Section #{index}' break ``` Write code within three backticks '```' to Expand the sections below, to find and click on the link "integer.". Code: ```python from bs4 import BeautifulSoup # parse the HTML state soup = BeautifulSoup(state, 'html.parser') # Find all the sections sections = soup.select("div.ui-accordion-content") for index, section in enumerate(sections, 1): if section.find("span", class_="alink", string="integer."): obs = f'"integer." is in Section #{index}' break ``` Now, write code within three backticks '```' to Expand the sections below, to find and click on the link "tortor". Code:

output:
```python
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
# parse the HTML state
soup = BeautifulSoup(state, 'html.parser')
# Find all the sections
sections = soup.select("div.ui-accordion-content")
for index, section in enumerate(sections, 1):
    if section.find("span", class_="alink", string="tortor"):
        obs = f'"tortor" is in Section #{index}'
        break
```

input.content:

```
agent.click_xpath("//*[@id='ui-id-1']")  # Expand Section #1
agent.click_xpath("(//span[@class='alink' and text()='morbi'])[1]")  # Click on the link 'morbi'
```
